rutils 0.0.0.9001
  • Reference

CacheCountBatch class

Source: R/utils.R
CacheCountBatch.Rd

CacheCountBatch class

CacheCountBatch class

Details

A class for caching results in count-based batches, storing them as JSON files.

Public fields

cache_name

Name of the cache.

cache_dir

Directory for cache files.

cache_filename

File path for the cached JSON.

get_count_func

Function to get total count of items.

get_batch_func

Function to fetch a batch of items.

batch_size

Number of items per batch.

sleep_between_calls

Delay in seconds between calls.

cached_list_results

Cached list of results.

Methods

Public methods

  • CacheCountBatch$new()

  • CacheCountBatch$init_cache()

  • CacheCountBatch$get_cached_list()

  • CacheCountBatch$is_key_in_cached_list()

  • CacheCountBatch$get_cached_item()

  • CacheCountBatch$clone()

Method new()

Initialize a new CacheCountBatch object

Usage

CacheCountBatch$new(
  cache_name,
  cache_dir,
  get_count_func,
  get_batch_func,
  batch_size,
  sleep_between_calls
)

Arguments

cache_name

Name of the cache.

cache_dir

Directory to store cache files.

get_count_func

Function returning total number of items.

get_batch_func

Function fetching a batch of items.

batch_size

Number of items per batch.

sleep_between_calls

Delay in seconds between calls.

Returns

A new CacheCountBatch object.

Method init_cache()

Initialize or refresh the cache by fetching and storing data.

Usage

CacheCountBatch$init_cache()

Returns

None. Populates the cache and writes JSON file to disk.

Method get_cached_list()

Retrieve the full cached results.

Usage

CacheCountBatch$get_cached_list()

Returns

A list of cached results.

Method is_key_in_cached_list()

Check if a key exists in the cached list.

Usage

CacheCountBatch$is_key_in_cached_list(item_key)

Arguments

item_key

The key to check.

Returns

TRUE if the key is in cache; FALSE otherwise.

Method get_cached_item()

Retrieve a specific cached item by key.

Usage

CacheCountBatch$get_cached_item(item_key)

Arguments

item_key

The key of the item to retrieve.

Returns

The cached item corresponding to the key.

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

CacheCountBatch$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
